it.polimi.se2019.ui

Interface UI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameEventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, GUI, VirtualView

    public interface UI
extends GameEventHandler
    Interface that defines all methods that can be called by the VirtualView on a client

      • choose

        java.lang.String choose(Bundle<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> options)
        Ask a player to select a option
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the selected option

      • chooseActionFrom

        Bundle<Action,java.io.Serializable> chooseActionFrom(Action[] possibleActions)
        Ask a player which action he wants to execute
        Parameters:
        possibleActions - the list of all possible action for that player
        Returns:
        the chosen action

      • chooseBlock

        Coordinates chooseBlock(int maxDistance)
                 throws CanceledActionException
        Ask a player to choose a block of the map
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - the max distance that the block must be compared to the player
        Returns:
        the chosen block
        Throws:
        CanceledActionException - if the player choose to cancel the action

      • chooseBlockFrom

        Parameters:
        coordinates - the list of the possible block that can be selected
        Returns:
        the chosen block
        Throws:
        CanceledActionException - if the player choose to cancel the action

        Returns:
